#summary Deploying

= Introduction =

GetEset working fine in Linux and *BSD systems. Tested in FreeBSD, pfSense and Debian Linux.

= Installation =

== Linux ==

=== Prepare ===

Install Unrar:

{{{
aptitude update
aptitude install unrar-free
}}}

== FreeBSD/pfSense ==

=== Prepare ===

Install Unrar (for FreeBSD):

{{{
cd /usr/ports/archivers/unrar; make install clean
}}}

Install Wget (for FreeBSD):
{{{
cd /usr/ports/ftp/wget; make install clean
}}}

for psSense:

{{{
/usr/sbin/pkg_add -r wget
/usr/sbin/pkg_add -r unrar
}}}
